text: Opening
trans: 序章

text: 姬塔 and company stop at Yudhisthira Island for some rest. They prepare to enjoy their time in the sun, when a giant fish being tailed by a gutsy woman appears out of the blue.
trans: 姬塔和她的队友们在尤迪斯提拉岛停了下来休息。当他们准备享受阳光之时，突然出现了一条巨大的鱼,它正在被一位勇敢的女士追逐着。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Katalina! Over here, hurry!
trans: :"卡塔莉娜！这边这边，快点过来！"

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Ah, hey, wait! Lyria! Come on, don't leave me behind!
trans: 啊，嘿，等等！露莉亚！别丢下我啊！

text: 姬塔 and company traverse the skies, searching for the Sky Map pieces that are the key to the new world.
trans: 姬塔和她的队友们遨游天空，寻找着连接新世界的关键——空图碎片。

text: As their journey continues, they make a pit stop at Yudhisthira Island in the Auguste Isles to refresh their minds and bodies.
trans: 伴随着路途，他们在奥古斯特群岛的尤迪斯提拉岛做了一次停留，以休养身心。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Geez! Come on, Katalina! It looks great on you, so why are you so embarrassed?
trans: 天啊！卡塔莉娜！这身衣服穿在你身上非常好看，为什么要那么害羞呢？

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Say, 姬塔. I know we're on vacation, but is it necessary for me to wear this?
trans: 姬塔，我知道我们在度假，但是我真的有必要穿这个吗？

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: I'm only going to relax on the beach. You, Lyria, and the others can go in the water without me.
trans: 我就在沙滩上休息。你、露莉亚和其他人想去水里玩的话不用等我。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: The sun's gonna cook you alive if you stay in your armor!
trans: 如果你在太阳下还穿盔甲的话会被烤熟的！

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: No, I don't think that's...
trans: 我觉得那应该不会...

name: Walder
text: You knights just never know when to give up!
trans: 你们骑士就是永远不知道何时罢手！

name: Walder
text: Yours truly was also terrified at the thought of relinquishing his forest ranger gear.
trans: 我也曾害怕放弃我的森林游侠装备。

name: Walder
text: But with this newly acquired gear, I've attained a new form! Henceforth, I shall be known as...
trans: 但有了这套新的装备，我达到了新的境界！从今以后，请称我为...

name: Walder
text: Ocean Ranger Walder! At your service!
trans: 海洋游侠,Walder,隆重登场

name: Sierokarte/榭洛科特
text: Looking sharp, everyone! I'm so glad to see my customers happy!
trans: 衣服都很合身呢,看到你们这么高兴我就放心了!

name: Sierokarte/榭洛科特
text: Good thing I secretly took your measurements that night you all stayed at the Knickknack Shack... Ahem, ahem.
trans: 幸好那天晚上你们都住在杂货小屋时，我悄悄给你们量了尺寸...咳咳。

name: Sierokarte/榭洛科特
text: I mean, what a perfect fit! Siero does it again!
trans: 我是说，衣服合身真是太好了！

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Wait a minute. What did you just say?
trans: 等等，你刚刚说什么？

text: No! I swear I won't let you escape this time!
trans: 给我站住！我发誓这次我不会让你逃走！

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Huh? What's going on?
trans: 嗯？那是什么？
